title: Phone was in my pocket, coat got wet (heavy downpour) & now the screen won't work
content:
I was caught in a heavy downpour of rain, my phone was in my pocket (waterproof jacket). When I got home and took the phone out, if felt damp/humid. The screen won't respond to touch. 
I've taken the screen protector off & removed the case. It has been in a sealed tuppawear container with rice for over 24 hours - still the screen won't respond to touch. It turns on but won't click on the apps I want & instead immediately goes onto my messages but won't select the Back Arrow function to go back to another screen
Any ideas how I can fix this please?
